page.title: 01COVERDALE YORKSHIRE DALES
page.content: County of North Yorkshire Within Richmondshire District Council survey area part of Carlton Highdale also within the Yorkshire Dales National Park. The survey includes 4 small areas of population and a landscape of open moor and meadow pastures with dry stone walls providing the field and moor boundries, local stone built houses and farm buildings being the only evidence of industry. Coverdale links Wensleydale & Wharfedale, having become more widley known during the past 5 years as a result of publicity received from the writings of James Herriot and the T.V. Vet series. It is basically a sheep farming area, tourism developing. Out of 40 properties only 23, which house 58 people, are lived in permanently. The rest are holiday cottages.
